name: Patagonia Dirt Roamer Bike Shorts - Women's
description:
When you're amping up for a long day in the saddle, reach for these contoured shorts to keep you riding comfortably. Articulated, sonic-welded seams reduce weight, stretch, and eliminate chafing - so you can devote all your focus to the trail ahead.Light, moisture-wicking fabric dries quickly.DWR-finish sheds rain and muck.Curved waistband follows your hip's natural shape.Snap loops pair them with Patagonia Endless Ride Liner Shorts or DirtCraft Bike Shorts.Zip fly and bike-specific OppoSet™ adjustable waist customizes the fit.Hidden zip pocket at right hip.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}








                      Recycled content
